Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Communication radio frequency drift. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Manufacturing defect in material composition leading to premature failure
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Mission Computer component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Conduct fleet-wide inspection campaign
d) Attributable Code: F - Failure/ageing/Corrosion/Material Failure
Remarks: Comprehensive analysis performed. Root cause identified and verified.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Detailed analysis indicates design margins are adequate. Failure attributed to operational factors. Concur with findings.
Date: 10/09/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia
